attributes.action: Cut Taxes for low and middle income earners and to cut public spending
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We cannot go on as we are taxing familes at current levels.
Fuel and food prices are rocketing and it is about time that the public sector started to share some of the pain that ordinary families are going through.
Every other major industrialized country is reducing the tax burden for their people why not ours.
The British people want more say in how their money is spent instead of a we know best approach from the current government. Please give us more of our money back
